MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L28 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Barons Hey and the surrounding area. Due to further investigations required on site we now expect to have supplies restored by 6:30pm.We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:15pm on the 9th April 2021.
